item.title: Creating A Documentation Website
item.description: This document provides instructions on creating and deploying a document website in GitHub with Hugo on a Windows 7 computer. Prerequisites Before creating a document website, make sure the following conditions are met: Hugo and Git are properly installed and configured on your computer. A GitHub account is created. Steps 1. Create a website with Hugo. 1.1 Open Command Prompt. Click the Start button on the desktop, and then type cmd in the search box.
